title: Payback: It's never too late to give payback
description: Imagine being sent to jail for a crime you did not commit. Your boyfriend testifies against you. Your family disowns you.You are an educated woman and successful teacher. You ask yourself, How did I get to this point? With your faith in God and a great friend anything is possible. Kajura is that women! Read "Payback" and see how this woman deals with unbelievable circumstances.
author: Kalaani
